properties.areaDesc: DeSoto, MS; Crittenden, AR; Shelby, TN
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 3 at 11:22AM CST until January 7 at 2:19PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Mississippi River...

Mississippi River at Memphis affecting Crittenden...DeSoto and
Shelby Counties

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the Mississippi River at Memphis
* from Friday, January 3, until Tuesday, January 7.
* At 11 AM Friday the stage was 22.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rise this weekend with a flat
crest near 29.1 feet by Thursday, January 9.
* At 29.0 feet...In Arkansas. the evacuation route from camps south
of Hopefield Chute is cut off. Water is lapping at the levee near
Sulcer Road west of South Lake. River is touching the levee at Blue
Lake.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
